verses.verse: There was a man <S%H376><s%> of the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Micah. <S%H4321><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to his mother, <S%H517><s%> "The eleven hundred <S%H505><s%> pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%> that were taken <S%H3947><s%> from you, <S%H422><s%> about which you uttered a curse, and also spoke <S%H559><s%> it in my ears, <S%H241><s%> behold, <S%H3701><s%> the silver is with me; <S%H3947><s%> I took it. <S%H517><s%>" His mother said, <S%H559><s%> "Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be my son <S%H1121><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>"

He restored <S%H7725><s%> the eleven hundred <S%H505><s%> pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%> to his mother; <S%H517><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "I most certainly <S%H6942><s%> dedicate <S%H6942><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> from my hand <S%H3027><s%> for my son, <S%H1121><s%> to make <S%H6213><s%> an engraved image <S%H6459><s%> and a molten image. <S%H6459><s%> Now therefore I will restore it to you. <S%H7725><s%>"

When he restored <S%H7725><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> to his mother, <S%H517><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> pieces of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them to the founder, <S%H6884><s%> who made <S%H6213><s%> of it an engraved image <S%H6459><s%> and a molten image: <S%H4541><s%> and it was in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah. <S%H4321><s%>

The man <S%H376><s%> Micah <S%H4318><s%> had a house <S%H1004><s%> of gods, <S%H430><s%> and he made <S%H6213><s%> an ephod, <S%H646><s%> and teraphim, <S%H8655><s%> and consecrated <S%H4390><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> who became his priest. <S%H3548><s%>
In those days <S%H3117><s%> there was no king <S%H4428><s%> in Israel: <S%H3478><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> that which was right <S%H3477><s%> in his own eyes. <S%H5869><s%>
There was a young man <S%H5288><s%> out of Bethlehem Judah, <S%H1035><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> who was a Levite; <S%H3881><s%> and he lived there. <S%H1481><s%>

The man <S%H376><s%> departed <S%H3212><s%> out of the city, <S%H5892><s%> out of Bethlehem Judah, <S%H1035><s%> to live <S%H1481><s%> where he could find <S%H4672><s%> a place, <S%H935><s%> and he came to the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah, <S%H4318><s%> as he traveled. <S%H6213><s%>

Micah <S%H4318><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H370><s%> "Where did you come <S%H935><s%> from? <S%H559><s%>" He said to him, <S%H3881><s%> "I am a Levite of Bethlehem Judah, <S%H1035><s%> and I am looking <S%H4672><s%> for a place <S%H1980><s%> to live. <S%H1481><s%>"

Micah <S%H4318><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3427><s%> "Dwell with me, <S%H1><s%> and be to me a father and a priest, <S%H3548><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you ten <S%H6235><s%> pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%> per year, <S%H3117><s%> a suit <S%H6187><s%> of clothing, <S%H899><s%> and your food. <S%H4241><s%>" So the Levite <S%H3881><s%> went in. <S%H3212><s%>
The Levite <S%H3881><s%> was content <S%H2974><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> with the man; <S%H376><s%> and the young man <S%H376><s%> was to him as one <S%H5288><s%> of his sons. <S%H1121><s%>
Micah <S%H4318><s%> consecrated <S%H4390><s%> the Levite, <S%H3881><s%> and the young man <S%H5288><s%> became his priest, <S%H3548><s%> and was in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah. <S%H4318><s%>
Then Micah <S%H4318><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Now know <S%H3045><s%> I that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will do good <S%H3190><s%> to me, <S%H3881><s%> since I have a Levite to my priest. <S%H3548><s%>"
